subject: Re: [junit] Need guidance
msgSnippet: Lokam, It looks like the cppunit-devel mailing list is used by users as well, and is somewhat active.  You may want to try there:
messageBody:
Lokam,

It looks like the cppunit-devel mailing list is used by users as well,
and is somewhat active. You may want to try there:

http://sourceforge.net/mail/?group_id=11795

Good luck,

David Saff

lokam.vasu@... wrote:

> Hi all,
>
>
>
> I have a query.
>
> In our team we are planning to establish unit testing using any useful
> tool.
>
> Our application is an embedded application using C++.
>
> I heard that CPPUnit is a freeware which can be effectively used for unit
> testing.
>
> We need some guidance regarding this. Can anyone suggest me some good
> material or web links where I can get detailed explanations or any
> training
> institutions in Pune - India.
>
>
>
> Can any one guide me regarding this?
>
> Please reply soon.
>
>
>
> Lokam
>
>
>
